title: Drawing, "Looking Across the Hudson Valley, New York", ca. 1867
medium: Brush and oil paint on thin paperboard
markings: Cooper Union stamp in black (Lugt 457c), lower right corner
description: Image of cloud-filled valley with sliver of water visible.  Dark clouds in strip above valley; orange clouds with patches of blue and green above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Looking Across the Hudson Valley, New York", ca. 1867.
ca. 1867. Brush and oil paint on thin paperboard. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-310.
